correct-1.description: Classes, interfaces, traits, enum, methods and variables ids within the limit

correct-2.description: Functions, constants and loop variables ids within the limit

incorrect-1.description: Classes, interfaces, traits, methods and variables ids outside the limit

incorrect-2.description: Functions, constants and loop variables ids outside the limit

min-correct-1.description: Nested for loop variables ids within the limit

max-incorrect-1.description: Functions, constants and loop variables ids outside the limit

throw-error-1.description: Throw error if min option is not a number

throw-error-2.description: Throw error if max option is not a number

throw-error-3.description: Throw error if exception option is not an array

throw-error-4.description: Throw error if min option is less than 1

throw-error-5.description: Throw error if max option is less than 1

throw-error-6.description: Throw error if min option is greater than max option
